title: How to Make Your Own Self Tanner

steps.headline: Put the eyeshadow or bronzer into your container.
steps.description: You can use the end of the spoon if it needs to be scraped out.

steps.headline: Add the lotion.
steps.description: The more you add, the lighter the tanner will turn out. Optional: Add the sunscreen. If you want to put in sunscreen, then you should lessen the amount of lotion you use.

steps.headline: Mix it all up.
steps.description: If you are not satisfied with the color, then add more eyeshadow or lotion, depending if it's too light or too dark.

steps.headline: Put the tea bags in the water and wait for them to steep.
steps.description: Don't put anything else in it!

steps.headline: Pour the tea into the spray bottle.
steps.description: You'll notice that the tea is a dark brown color.

steps.headline: Go onto the grass and spray 5 to 10 inches (12.7 to 25.4 cm) away depending on the strength of your sprayer in order to apply.
steps.description: It might be drippy, so you'll have to wait a couple minutes after you spray it, and lightly dab it.

steps.headline: Put the tea bags in the water and wait for them to steep.
steps.description: Don't put anything else in it!

steps.headline: Pour the tea into the spray bottle.
steps.description: You'll notice that the tea is a dark brown color.

steps.headline: Go onto the grass and spray 5 to 10 inches (12.7 to 25.4 cm) away depending on the strength of your sprayer in order to apply.
steps.description: It might be drippy, so you'll have to wait a couple minutes after you spray it, and lightly dab it.

tyn: Any plastic container with a lid (old makeup container, tupperware, etc.)
Eyeshadow or bronzer that is the color you want the tanner to be
text: Eyeshadow Method Put the eyeshadow or bronzer into your container. You can use the end of the spoon if it needs to be scraped out. Add the lotion. The more you add, the lighter the tanner will turn out. Optional: Add the sunscreen. If you want to put in sunscreen, then you should lessen the amount of lotion you use. Mix it all up. If you are not satisfied with the color, then add more eyeshadow or lotion, depending if it's too light or too dark. Gather your supplies.  Heat up the water.  Put the tea bags in the water and wait for them to steep. Don't put anything else in it! Pour the tea into the spray bottle. You'll notice that the tea is a dark brown color. Go onto the grass and spray 5 to 10 inches (12.7 to 25.4 cm) away depending on the strength of your sprayer in order to apply. It might be drippy, so you'll have to wait a couple minutes after you spray it, and lightly dab it. Tea Bag Method Gather your supplies.  Heat up the water.  Put the tea bags in the water and wait for them to steep. Don't put anything else in it! Pour the tea into the spray bottle. You'll notice that the tea is a dark brown color. Go onto the grass and spray 5 to 10 inches (12.7 to 25.4 cm) away depending on the strength of your sprayer in order to apply. It might be drippy, so you'll have to wait a couple minutes after you spray it, and lightly dab it.
sentences: Eyeshadow Method Put the eyeshadow or bronzer into your container.
You can use the end of the spoon if it needs to be scraped out.
Add the lotion.
The more you add, the lighter the tanner will turn out.
Optional: Add the sunscreen.
If you want to put in sunscreen, then you should lessen the amount of lotion you use.
Mix it all up.
If you are not satisfied with the color, then add more eyeshadow or lotion, depending if it's too light or too dark.
Gather your supplies.
Heat up the water.
Put the tea bags in the water and wait for them to steep.
Don't put anything else in it!
Pour the tea into the spray bottle.
You'll notice that the tea is a dark brown color.
Go onto the grass and spray 5 to 10 inches (12.7 to 25.4 cm) away depending on the strength of your sprayer in order to apply.
It might be drippy, so you'll have to wait a couple minutes after you spray it, and lightly dab it.
Tea Bag Method Gather your supplies.
Heat up the water.
Put the tea bags in the water and wait for them to steep.
Don't put anything else in it!
Pour the tea into the spray bottle.
You'll notice that the tea is a dark brown color.
Go onto the grass and spray 5 to 10 inches (12.7 to 25.4 cm) away depending on the strength of your sprayer in order to apply.
It might be drippy, so you'll have to wait a couple minutes after you spray it, and lightly dab it.
